Salient Features

What makes us unique and different
  1. Home
  2. About Us
  3. Salient Features

CBSE Curriculum

Affiliated with CBSE, New Delhi, offering a comprehensive curriculum from Pre-Primary to Senior Secondary levels.

Modern Infrastructure

Sprawling campus with state-of-the-art facilities designed to support 360-degree development.

Experienced Faculty

Dedicated team of qualified and experienced teachers committed to academic excellence.

Smart Classrooms

Technology-enabled learning with digital classrooms, projectors, and interactive teaching aids.

Well-Equipped Labs

Modern science, computer, and robotics laboratories for hands-on learning experiences.

Rich Library

Extensive collection of books, journals, and digital resources to foster reading habits.

Sports Facilities

Multiple playgrounds, basketball courts, and indoor sports facilities for physical development.

Arts & Culture

Dedicated spaces for music, dance, and theatre to nurture creative expression.

Safe Environment

CCTV surveillance, trained security staff, and child-safety protocols for a secure campus.

Transport Facility

GPS-enabled buses covering major routes with trained drivers and attendants.

Health Care

On-campus medical room with trained staff and tie-ups with nearby hospitals.

Holistic Development

Focus on academics, sports, arts, and life skills for well-rounded personality development.

Affiliated To
